Our expert's view of the main contenders and likely winner of the race. Part of RACINGPOST.com Members' Club

CESIUM faces different conditions here but he looks worth chancing in a race where a good deal of guesswork is involved about the others. Shindig has hopes if the ground dries out, but Cordier may be the selection´s most dangerous rival.
